## Moocher - Keep Moochers Out

This is Ruby interface for Moocher api, A Reputation API and Anti-Abuse Service. Still in developmental phase.
Currently functioning features are listed below.


## Check Blacklisted IP

```ruby
require 'moocher'

ip_blacklisted? "8.8.8.8"

#=> false

# If IP is found in blacklisted database it will return true.
```

## Check Blacklisted domains

```ruby
require 'moocher'

domain_blacklisted? "google.com"
#=> false

domain_blacklisted? "google.com", details: true #Swithing details to true will give you detailed response on domain
```

## Check Blacklisted Emails

```ruby
require 'moocher'

email_blacklisted? "goodemail@gmail.com"
#=> false

email_blacklisted? "goodemail@gmail.com", details: true

#=> {"response"=>{"address"=>{"score"=>0, "is_well_formed"=>true, "is_role"=>false}, "domain"=>{"mx"=>["alt1.gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com", "alt3.gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com", ```ruby
```
```ruby
email_blacklisted? "goodmail@gmail.com"
#also returns freemail hash like below which is type bademail even though the email was not found in any blacklist database

#"freemail"=>{"score"=>0, "is_freemail"=>true}}, "type"=>"bademail"}
```
